text: The League of Lezhë (2 March 1444 – 25 April 1479) was a group of Albanian principalities. It was formed in Lezhë on 2 March 1444. It was the first time most of Albania was united. It was started by Skanderbeg to fight the Ottoman Armies. ==References== Category:History of Albania Category:1440s establishments in Europe Category:15th-century disestablishments
title: League of Lezhë
